section.title: Linking between pages and cards
section.p: Mingle pages can be linked to from both card descriptions and other Mingle pages in your project by typing the page name enclosed in double square brackets: [[page_name]]
You can also link to specific cards from within both cards and pages by typing in the card number prefixed by a card keyword: #123
In this case, the card keyword is the # symbol, however the actual prefix you use in front of card numbers depends on the card keywords you setup.

bullets.item: When typing the above links inline in edit mode, they will appear as normal text. They will become links when you save your page or card.

You can also reference Mingle pages directly using URL's: http://mingle.yourcompany.com/projects/your_project/wiki/new_page, however you will still have to sign in to Mingle in order view the referenced page.

section.p: Read more about inline links and cross project linking to learn how to link to additional resources in your and other Mingle projects.
